name: Wildfire Interactive, Inc.
description: Developer of social media marketing software. The company helps corporations, small businesses, marketing agencies, bloggers and non-profits to create their own branded interactive promotions, such as sweepstakes, contests, give-aways and incentive-based surveys, as well as to simultaneously publish them in various social networks and on their website.
one_liner: Developer of social media marketing software. The company helps corporations, small businesses, marketing agencies, bloggers and non-profits to create their own branded interactive promotions, such as sweepstakes, contests, give-aways and incentive-based surveys, as well as to simultaneously publish them in various social networks and on their website.
